entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow or rain showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 30%
